instructions: Type in your desired service address below to search for available subscriptions.
instructions2: If you encounter any difficulty, give us a call!
phoneValidation: Use international format +CC AAA-XXX XX XX
passwordValidation: At least 8 characters, 1 uppercase and lowercase letter, and 1 number
serviceAddress: Address where service will be installed
createAccountToLogin: Create an account and log in to order.
theTerms: I have read and understand the terms and conditions for all requested subscriptions.
name: Name
terminationCardDescription: Select a day when your subscription should end or press 'Indefinite' to keep your subscription activated.
pickSubscriptionStart: Pick the day when your subscription should start.
gpdrDescription: In order to provide the services that you are requesting, we need to collect and record some of your personal information
step0Intro: Because your privacy is important to us, we ask for your consent to collect and keep your personally identifiable information and want to remind you of your right to be forgotten.
step0Label: I consent that personally identifiable information I provide on this site will be collected and recorded.
step0Label2: I understand that I have the 'right to be forgotten' and I may, at any time, request the complete and irreversible removal of all my personally identifiable information via phone or email.
step1Intro: Is this a private or a business account?
step1Radio1: This account is being created for a private person.
step1Radio2: This account is being created for a business.
step3Field1: You will need to verify your email before your subscriptions are activated
step4Description: If you would like to change these options, please contact your service provider
